column4: Easy Question!  I have / and /home partioned seperately.  After some file corruption problems, I just reloaded /
however, it's asking for a Username and password, but it never had me put any in during install.  I'm confused.

I just did a fresh installation of /.   For some reason it never prompted me to create a new username and password.  However it wants one to log in.  The old one doesn't work.  I'm completely confused.
